message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $115.  It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time and consideration, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $100 just doesn't work for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $107.50?  It's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I'm willing to go a little lower, but $105 just isn't quite there yet. How about we settle on $106?  It's a fair compromise and gets us closer to a deal.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $103. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $103 just doesn't work for me.  Let's meet in the middle at $104.  It's a fair price considering the value of this product.
I understand you're trying to make a fair deal, but I'm still a bit stretched at $104. Would you be willing to meet me at $102?
